entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
